Class BigTwoClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • BigTwoClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CardGame, NetworkGame

    public class BigTwoClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements CardGame, NetworkGame
    Class that implements the client server for each player. Includes all the information of one player.
    Author:
    choijaewon

    • Constructor Detail

      • BigTwoClient

        public BigTwoClient()
        Constructor that makes one user of the game. Makes list of hands on table. Makes list of four different players. Creates players and add them to the list of players. Makes table used for making GUI. Connects to the Game Server.

      • start

        public void start(Deck deck)
        Clears the message of the text area. Sets the conditions for the game. Starts the game with a deck. Removes all cards from players and table. Distributes cards to each player. Identifies who has diamond three thus making the player as the first player to play. Updates the value of current player and active player by identifying who is the first player.
        Specified by:
        start in interface CardGame
        Parameters:
        deck - BigTwo card deck used for game.

      • makeMove

        public void makeMove(int playerID,
                     int[] cardIdx)
        Sends the object type MOVE which includes the index of selected cards of a player to the BigTwoServer.
        Specified by:
        makeMove in interface CardGame
        Parameters:
        playerID - Integer value indicating the index of this client.
        cardIdx - Integer array that stores the integer value of index of selected cards.

      • checkMove

        public void checkMove(int playerID,
                      int[] cardIdx)
        Checks the move by the player with certain ID is valid or not. Rejects the move if the move by the player is invalid. Prints out corresponding message to GUI according to the move by player. Decides whether to pass the turn to next player. Checks if game must be ended or not.
        Specified by:
        checkMove in interface CardGame
        Parameters:
        playerID - Integer value indicating index of this client.
        Integer - array that stores the integer value of index of selected cards.

        Checks if the game must be ended or not.
        Specified by:
        endOfGame in interface CardGame
        Returns:
        true if a current player has no cards in hand. false otherwise.

      • composeHand

        public static Hand composeHand(CardGamePlayer player,
                               CardList cards)
        Composes valid hand according to the condition of each hand of the BigTwo card game.
        Parameters:
        player - player who selected this hand.
        cards - selected cards by the player.
        Returns:
        Hand returns one of Single, Pair, Triple, Straight, Flush, FullHouse, Quad, and StraightFlush if the hand is valid. returns null if it is not a valid hand.
